g.text: - escrow the specified amount of the denomination
- store the commitment of the SendPacket (including FungibleTokenPacketData) to the storage
3. (Relayer) Scan events, make a RecvPacket, and request a TX (TX1) with the RecvPacket to B
- unescrow the specified amount of the denomination
- store the receipt of the ReceivePacket
- WriteAcknowledgement (store the ack data and send ack)
6. (Relayer) Scan events, make MsgAcknowledgement and request a TX (TX2) with the message to A
